alert.note: Alert for McLean (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 2:25PM CST until January 02 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM SATURDAY TO 6 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 5 inches with highest amounts in the north. A glaze of ice accumulation is possible. North winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central Illinois. * WHEN...From 6 AM Saturday to 6 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility will be reduced by snow and gusty winds. Dangerously cold temperatures are expected by early Sunday morning, with wind chills near or below zero.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the Internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com
